name: Unauthorized acquisition of a vehicle
description:
"Start With Nothing" This game starts with nothing like literally. Soon you can be criminal mastermind and make heists. First there is only little tutorial then you can play in little map.  

Hint: "Old man moving on map, go talk to him"

There is lot of bugs that we know (you need to walk around car to get in for example)

There is VERY HIGH texture map so wait times are long. Please be patient.

Requirements (LOWEST)
  • Intel i5 gen 6 th
  • 8 GB RAM memory
  • NVIDIA 1080 TI
  • Windows 7
  • 10GB Available space 
Recommended system
  • Intel i7 gen 9th - 11th / Intel i9 gen 9th - 11th / AMD ryzen 7 / AMD ryzen 9
  • +16 GB RAM memory
  • NVIDIA RTX 2070 / NVIDIA RTX 2080 / NVIDIA RTX 3070, NVIDIA RTX 3080
  • Windows 10/11
  • 10GB Available space 

Updates coming soon.

Made With Unreal Engine 5

Made By: 

Lauri Salonen - Careeria Lead Programmer

Ringo Õunapuu  - Careeria Lead Desinger
